issue.title: ArithmeticLike conversions from integral, floating-point types should be explicit

discussion.p: We would like to use the ArithmeticLike concept in places where the user types might only have explicit conversions from the built-in arithmetic types, e.g., in class duration. For example, the user may have created an arithmetic emulator type but wanted to keep conversions to a minimum to make the type safer to use.
